message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a good chunk too. Accept this and we can both be happy.
You're being greedy, I'll give you a smaller share, but you still get a good deal.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile.  Accept this and we can avoid further losses.
You're being stubborn, I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
